CUE: “Looks like it’s going to be another late night at the office.”
“These are my notes. They cover the recent cases of mysterious comas plaguing the city. I need to find out what’s happening before it gets any worse.”
“I may be taking a break now, but this is no time to be staring at the clock. I need to brainstorm.”
“I must have been researching for hours. It feels good to stretch and walk around.”
“Not a real tree. I already have enough responsibilities to look after. It just sits there, watching me work.”
“Sounds like I’m the only one here. ...I still have more to do. I’m not giving up yet.”
“When did these incidents start? I should write that down.”
